Package order

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CancelOrderGUI
    Provides a GUI that shows all the user orders and allows to cancel them
    ComplaintCreationGUI
    this class holds all the GUI related info so we could start the complaint creation process
    ComplaintManageGUI
    Provides a GUI to handle complaint management
    createOrderBySearchGUI
    Provides a GUI to create an order by search(without the catalog)
    CreateOrderGUI
    Provides a GUI that allow the customer to finalize his order
    CustomItemGUI
    Provides a GUI allows the customer to order custom Item
    CustomItemInOrder
    Holds the custom Item data that is in the current Order
    CustomItemInOrderView
    The class that holds the data to be shown in the customItems TableView
    CustomItemView
    class that holds the data to be shown in the CreateOrderGUI TableView holds the info for a custom Item
    HandleComplaintGUI
    a class that holds all the needed functions for the handle Complaint GUI, which takes care of a selected complaint
    NewComplaintCreationGUI
    Provides a gui to enable the creation of a new complaint
    Order
    The Order Entity holds all the information for the order table
    OrderComplaint
    a class that holds all the information about order complaints
    OrderComplaintController
    a class that holds the functionality related to order complaints
    OrderComplaintView
    The class that holds the data to be shown in the order complaint TableView
    OrderController
    Provides an API to to the order table in the database
    OrderItemView
    The class that holds the data to be shown in the items to order TableView
    OrderItemViewButton
    This class creates an observable button
    OrderRow
    The class that holds the data to be shown in the cancelOrder TableView It is the order class with buttons added for showing in a TableView
    OrderView
    the class responsible for showing orders in a table view
    ProductInOrder
    This Class holds the data for a product in a order Holds the same data as product just with an added greetingCard string
    Receipt
    a class that holds all the information needed for the receipt entity
    SelectOrderForComplaintGUI
    In this GUI we select an order of a specific user, to complain about
    ViewCustomItemGUI
    Provides a GUI that allow to see the components of a custom item
    ViewCustomProductsInOrder
    Provides a GUI that allow to see the custom items in a certain order
    ViewDelivery
    Provides a GUI that allow to see the order delivery information
    ViewProductInOrder
    Provides a GUI that allow to the see the products in a certain order
